description: The Department of Defense has confirmed the deaths of two American service members.
title: U.S. Military Deaths in Afghanistan
title_page: U.S. Military Deaths in Afghanistan - The New York Times
text:
The Department of Defense has identified 2,344 American service members who have died as a part of the Afghan war and related operations and five service members who have died supporting the operation to eliminate the Islamic State militant group. It confirmed the deaths of the following Americans recently:
Afghanistan
RUIZ, Pablo A., 37, Sgt. First Class, Army; Melbourne, Fla.; Group Support Battalion, Third Special Forces Group.
ISIS Operations
BURRIS, Ryan D., 24, Petty Officer Third Class, Navy; Lisle, Ill.; Crisis Response Element of Joint Special Operations Task Force-Arabian Peninsula, Special Operations Command Central, U.S. Central Command.
